amendment.description: An amendment numbered 14 printed in Part B of House Report 118-559 to prohibit funds to approve of Foreign Military Sales to Ukraine.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 61 - 350 (Roll no. 303).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 61 - 350 (Roll no. 303).
